public class XslParser
extends LpexCommonParser

XSL parser for Java LPEX. Extends LpexCommonParser.

Constructor Detail

XslParser

public XslParser(LpexView lpexView)
Constructor for the parser. Add all of the parser specifics to the Lpex view. Initializes the Lpex view for the parser: it sets up all the style attributes, classes, etc. for the language-sensitive edit features supported.
Parameters:
lpexView - the LPEX document view associated with this parser.

parseElement

public void parseElement(int element)
Incremental parse.
Overrides:
parseElement in class LpexCommonParser
Parameters:
element - the element whose committed change triggered the parse, or the element that precedes / follows a deleted block. The parser may identify other neighbouring elements that will have to be reparsed as a unit.
